originalText.text: I love the sense of community at this school, the Teachers have such a love in what they do and in the way they teach the children. The PTA runs events that bring families together, building fun memories of the school years. My kids really love coming to school as they feel supported by the teachers in learning new tricky topics. I feel that through the IPC curriculum my children have retained more information and have more fun at school than they have ever before.

text.text: I love the sense of community at this school, the Teachers have such a love in what they do and in the way they teach the children. The PTA runs events that bring families together, building fun memories of the school years. My kids really love coming to school as they feel supported by the teachers in learning new tricky topics. I feel that through the IPC curriculum my children have retained more information and have more fun at school than they have ever before.

originalText.text:
This school is a hidden gem amongst the concrete jungle of Manhattan. You feel welcome the minute you walk into the building. The staff is all very friendly, helpful, open & available, and takes the time to get to know you and your child; Even the teachers from different grades. It's a very warm and welcoming community.

My daughter has been here for 3 years now, having moved from our local public school after feeling overwhelmed by the class sizes. We were attracted to Nord Anglia because of the combination of Inquiry Based Learning, small class sizes with individualized curriculums, the artists in residence program, and the MIT collaborations. With a daughter who is very interested in both art and science, this school is the perfect fit. Lessons are constructed in a way that carries a theme throughout different subject matters, giving the children an opportunity to look at it from multiple disciplines, which makes it very easy for the children to digest and retain the information. I'm always impressed with the passion my daughter brings home

It really is an amazing school. I only wish it went all of the way through High School!

originalText.text: I am very pleased about my experience at Nord Anglia International School and with the care and attention my daughter gets from her teachers and from all the staff. The school provides a multicultural, supportive and nurturing environment which challenges and engages my daughter every day with great extracurricular activities, music and sports. She really enjoys going to school and I couldn’t be happier about her progresses. I highly recommend this school!

text.text: I am very pleased about my experience at Nord Anglia International School and with the care and attention my daughter gets from her teachers and from all the staff. She really enjoys going to school and I couldn’t be happier about her progresses. I highly recommend this school!

originalText.text: We welcome visitors and prospective parents to our school at anytime! There are two parts to our roles that we love in our school - one is being with our amazing students everyday, and secondly sharing what we do with others! So, please, come and visit our school and learn how our wonderful community, international ethos and curriculum and links to our worldwide Nord Anglia family bring amazing benefits and opportunities for our students! We look forward to seeing you soon!!!

originalText.text: Fantastic school. The atmosphere is genuinely friendly and inclusive.
